sen.j: 三条 実香（さんじょう さねか、文明 (日本)元年（1469年） - 永禄2年2月25日 (旧暦)（1559年4月2日））は室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Saneka SANJO (1469 - February 25, 1559) was a Kugyo (court noble) in the Muromachi period.
Saneka SANJO (1469 - February 25, 1559) was a Kugyo (court noble) in the Muromachi period.
Saneka SANJO (1469 - April 12, 1559) was a Kugyo (high court noble) in the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: February 25 をApril 12 に修正しました。court noble をhigh court noble に修正しました。

sen.e: He was a son of Kinatsu SANJO.
He was a son of Kinatsu SANJO.
He was a son of Kinatsu SANJO.

sen.j: 子には三条公頼、三条香子（伏見宮貞敦親王室、伏見宮邦輔親王母）がいる。
sen.e: His children were Kinyori SANJO, Koshi SANJO (the lawful wife of the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadaatsu, the mother of the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunisuke.)
His children were Kinyori SANJO and Koshi SANJO (the wife of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadaatsu and mother of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunisuke).
His children were Kinyori SANJO and Koshi SANJO (the wife of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadaatsu and mother of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunisuke).
His go (pen name) was Gojodoji.
His go (pen name) was Gojodoji.
His go (pen name) was Gojodoji.
His homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) was Taiku.
His Buddhist name was Taiku.
His Buddhist name was Taiku.

sen.j: 文明元年（1469年）に三条公敦の子として生まれる。
sen.e: In 1469, he was born as a child of Kinatsu SANJO.
In 1469, he was born as a child of Kinatsu SANJO.
In 1469, he was born as a child of Kinatsu SANJO.

sen.j: 長享元年（1487年）7月29日 (旧暦)、叙従三位。
sen.e: In July 29, 1487, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank.)
On July 29, 1487, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
On August 27, 1487, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: July 29 をAugust 27 に修正しました。

sen.j: 永正4年（1507年）に内大臣（1507年 - 1515年）となる。
sen.e: In 1507, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1507 - 1515.)
In 1507, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center 1507 – 1515).
In 1507, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center 1507 – 1515).

sen.j: 永正12年（1515年）12月26日 (旧暦)、叙従一位。
sen.e: In December 26, 1515, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank.)
On December 26, 1515, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
On February 8, 1516, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: December 26, 1515 をFebruary 8, 1516 に修正しました。

sen.j: 同年に右大臣（1515年 - 1518年）となる。
sen.e: In the same year, he became Udaijin (Minister of the Right) (1515 - 1518.)
In the same year, he became Udaijin (Minister of the Right, 1515 – 1518).
In the same year, he became Udaijin (Minister of the Right, 1515 – 1518).

sen.j: 天文 (元号)4年（1535年）に太政大臣（1535年 - 1536年）となる。
sen.e: In 1535, he became Daijo daijin (Grand Minister) (1535 - 1536.)
In 1535, he became Daijo daijin (Grand Minister, 1535 – 1536).
In 1535, he became Daijo daijin (Grand minister of state, 1535 – 1536).
sen.cmt: Grand Minister をGrand minister of state に修正しました。

sen.j: 天文6年（1537年）2月8日 (旧暦)（2月9日 (旧暦)?）に出家。
sen.e: In February 8, 1537, he entered the priesthood.
On February 8, 1537, he entered the priesthood.
On March 29 (or 30), 1537, he entered the priesthood.
sen.cmt: February 8 をMarch 29 (or 30) に修正しました。

sen.e: In 1559, he passed away.
In 1559, he passed away.
In 1559, he passed away.
